document.full_text: fighting between northern sudanese forces and armed groups in the tense southern kordofan border state for a fourth day tuesday forced many residents to flee the state capital kadugli, witnesses said.
document.title: residents flee sudan flashpoint state clashes
lines_and_colors: fighting between northern sudanese forces and armed groups in the tense southern kordofan border state for a fourth day tuesday forced many residents to flee the state capital kadugli, witnesses said.
